amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), add the following: SEC.___. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used for any activity by Transportation Security Administration Transportation Security Officers outside an airport as defined in section 47102 of title 49, United States Code.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to be used for any activity by Transportation Security Administration Transportation Security Officers outside an airport as defined in section 47102 of title 49, United States Code.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Blackburn amendment (A042) Failed by recorded vote: 196 - 225 (Roll no. 209).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Blackburn amendment (A042) Failed by recorded vote: 196 - 225 (Roll no. 209).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A042) offered by Mrs. Blackburn.
